alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Camden; Chowan; Eastern Currituck; Pasquotank; Perquimans; Western Currituck (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 9:48PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A line of showers will impact portions of central Camden, central Pasquotank, Perquimans, southeastern Bertie, northwestern Currituck and Chowan Counties through 1030 PM EST... At 947 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking showers along a line extending from near Belvidere to 7 miles southeast of Williamston. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Currituck, Elizabeth City, Camden, Windsor, Hertford, Winfall, Elizabeth City State University, Chapanoke, Cape Colony, Snug Harbor, Nixonton, Belvidere, Rockyhock, Morgans Corner, Burgess, Whitehall Shores, Valhalla, Moyock, Knotts Island and Pasquotank. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bertie; Camden; Chowan; Eastern Currituck; Pasquotank; Perquimans; Western Currituck
